snippet: Superior video games, like the new Call of Duty: Black Ops II and Halo 4, are more like chess with added firepower than mere violent mayhem.
abstract: Stephen Totilo contends that latest batch of newly released shooter video games, like Call of Duty: Black Ops II and Halo 4, offer experiences far more engrossing than mere violent mayhem.
lead_paragraph: Superior video games, like the new Call of Duty: Black Ops II and Halo 4, are more like chess with added firepower than mere violent mayhem.

headline.seo: Call of Duty: Black Ops II and Halo 4
headline.main: In Defense of Offense: Why We Gamers Shoot
headline.print_headline: In Defense of Offense: Why We Gamers Shoot
